class bhp_registration.models.BaseRegisteredSubjectModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_sync.classes.base_sync_model.BaseSyncModel

Base model for models that need a key to RegisteredSubject.

Such models may be listed by name in the ScheduledGroup model and thus trigger the creation of appointments. Other instances may be Additional forms which are link to a subject but not a time point (for example, a Death model or OffStudy model (see also AdditionalEntryBucket)

Use this along with BaseRegisteredSubjectModelAdmin()

Parameters:
  • created (CreationDateTimeField) – Created
  • modified (ModificationDateTimeField) – Modified
  • user_created (CharField) – User created
  • user_modified (CharField) – User modified
  • hostname_created (HostnameCreationField) – Hostname
  • hostname_modified (HostnameModificationField) – Hostname
  • id (MyUUIDField) – Id
  • registered_subject_id (OneToOneField) – Registered subject
